abstractive.text: The interface specialist presents, talking about the possible components of the remote and concluding that the remote should be simple and accessible without too much functionality.

abstractive.text: The group has brought up a number of technological possibilities, have conflicting views about them, and have not yet made decisions about them.
abstractive.text_fr: Le groupe a mis en place un certain nombre de possibilités technologiques, ont des opinions divergentes quant à eux, et n'ont pas encore pris de décision à leur sujet.
